recipesJson.name: Morning Sunrise Yogurt Mousse
recipesJson.author: MECH_MOD_RN
recipesJson.description:
a simple creamy light summer  ADV.    The Cap creamy yogurt adds a light subtle tart note to contrast the  sweetness of  mix and keeps things interesting.     The Meringue  and whipped cream add   some volume to the mouth feel without  adding heaviness.  The  pudding  adds some more of a vanilla  note and helps with the finish  .  
mixed up for mixing in the kitchen   episode  on yogurt   https://youtu.be/JS7fE5ONxx8  

LOOKING for a group to learn about  mixing your own juice check out these groups and your tube channels
